fullgame.name: Lillian Night: Exclusive Contract of Succubus

name: Lillian Night: Exclusive Contract of Succubus (Demo)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7-11700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
